sourcesContent:
// src/components/JoinUs.js import React from 'react'; import { Typography, Box, Grid, Link } from '@mui/material'; import uiucLogo from "../assets/dassl.png"; import groupImage from "../assets/dassl.png"; // Replace with the path to the uploaded image function JoinUs() { return ( Join Us We are actively looking for strong and self-motivated PhD students to join DASSL at UIUC. Please apply to the UIUC CS PhD program and mention Aishwarya Ganesan (aganesn2@illinois.edu) or Ram Alagappan (ramn@illinois.edu) as potential advisors in your application. UIUC has a stellar systems group (see csrankings) that you can be a part of and contribute.

At DASSL, you'll gain hands-on experience with advanced system design, contribute to influential research publications, and prepare for a successful career in academia or industry. Explore how high-performance computing and innovative data management can address some of the most challenging problems facing technology today. Quick Links Projects Publications Code People Follow Us ); } export default JoinUs;
